column3: God, our genes, our environment, or some stupid programmer keying in code at an ancient terminal - there's no way free will can ever exist if we as individuals are the result of some external cause.
God, Nature, the wise, the world, preach man, exhort him both by word and deed to the study of himself.
When God sneezed, I didn't know what to say.
Nature is the art of God.
Man is to man either a god or a wolf.
God tempers the wind to the shorn lamb.
You have to be humble when you're dealing with God.
If God wanted us to fly, He would have given us tickets.
I did not write it. God wrote it. I merely did his dictation.
The eye with which I see God is the same eye with which God sees me.
Whatever your heart clings to and confides in, that is really your God.
Sorrow is a fruit. God does not make it grow on limbs too weak to bear it.
Why did God give me two ears and one mouth? So that I will hear more and talk less.
God doesn't seek for golden vessels, and does not ask for silver ones, but He must have clean ones.
The courage to be is rooted in the God who appears when God has disappeared in the anxiety of doubt.
God gives us relatives; thank God, we can choose our friends.
We must seek the loving-kindness of God in all the breadth and open-air of common life.
In this world you've just got to hope for the best and prepare for the worst and take whatever God sends.
One day I promised God that if he would give me my voice back I would never smoke again. I got three octaves back after quitting.
He who desires to worship God must harbor no childish illusions about the matter but bravely renounce his liberty and humanity.
Dear God, Please send to me the spirit of Your peace. Then send, dear Lord, the spirit of peace from me to all the world. Amen.
God gave me a voice to sing with, and when you have that, what other gimmick is there?
From the solemn gloom of the temple children run out to sit in the dust, God watches them play and forgets the priest.
When men stop believing in God, it isn't that they then believe in nothing: they believe in everything.
I regret and suffer those losses, but it's God's will. He will pardon me if I committed excesses, but I don't think I did.
I thank my God for graciously granting me the opportunity of learning that death is the key which unlocks the door to our true happiness.
